pregnancy and community mobilization activities. There was also a significant reduction 
in the perinatal mortality rate (PMR). However, all studies were conducted in South Asia, 
and results from two African studies are not yet available. No data are available on any 
potential harms related to home visits.
Values and preferences: Health providers, policy-makers and families in LMIC settings
